i like tech which impacts people's lives in a good way. art, history, or science entwined makes it interesting even more for me.

## Skills & Tech Stack

```{python}
#| echo: false
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px

df = pd.DataFrame([
  {"category":"Languages","skill":"Python","value":30,"level":"Proficient"},
  {"category":"Languages","skill":"Java","value":30,"level":"Proficient"},
  {"category":"Web Development","skill":"HTML/CSS","value":18,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Web Development","skill":"JavaScript","value":18,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Web Development","skill":"JSP","value":12,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Data Science","skill":"Pandas","value":12,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Data Science","skill":"NumPy","value":12,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Data Science","skill":"Scikit-learn","value":12,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Data Science","skill":"sktime","value":10,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Tools & Platforms","skill":"Git","value":15,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Tools & Platforms","skill":"GitHub","value":15,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Tools & Platforms","skill":"Android Studio","value":12,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Tools & Platforms","skill":"Render","value":10,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Tools & Platforms","skill":"Colab","value":12,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Tools & Platforms","skill":"Quarto","value":10,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Databases","skill":"PostgreSQL","value":15,"level":"Good"},
  {"category":"Databases","skill":"MySQL","value":15,"level":"Good"}
])

fig = px.treemap(df, 
                 path=['category','skill'], 
                 values='value',
                 color='level',
                 color_discrete_map={"Proficient":"#C8A2C8","Good":"#B5D5C5"},
                 hover_data={'value':False, 'level':True})

fig.update_layout(
    margin=dict(t=10,l=5,r=5,b=10),
    height=550,
    paper_bgcolor='rgba(0,0,0,0)',
    plot_bgcolor='rgba(0,0,0,0)',
    font=dict(size=13, family="Lato, sans-serif", color="#0D0C0F")
)

fig.update_traces(
    textposition="middle center",
    textfont=dict(size=12, color="#0D0C0F"),
    marker=dict(line=dict(width=2, color='white'), cornerradius=5),
    hovertemplate='<b>%{label}</b><br>Level: %{customdata[0]}<extra></extra>'
)

fig.show(config={'responsive': True, 'displayModeBar': False})
```
